text: Bradford is a census-designated place (CDP) and historic district in Westerly and Hopkinton in Washington County, Rhode Island. The population was 1,457 at the 2020 United States Census. The Bradford Village Historic District was listed in 1996 as a 224 acre area. It includes 150 contributing buildings plus one site. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Rhode Island
title: Bradford, Rhode Island
